div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1711 Tebtunis (mod. Umm el Buregat), (1074) 25 km. SSW of El Fayoum, 1900 Burial: c. 90 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 140 AR. From excavations, house in temple enclosure Ptolemy IX Soter II: 9 tetradr. (Alex- andreia) Ptolemy X Alexander I and Cleopatra: 5 tetradr. (Alexandreia) Ptolemy X Alexander I alone: 126 tetradr. (Alexandreia) Disposition: University of California (Mu- seum of Anthropology) Milne, JEA 1935, p. 210
